name: Going Green Fruit, Veggie Market Baggie in Lime
description:
Love fruits and veggies? Then, you'll love these.

Environmentally-friendly market bags for your fresh produce. Say 'no' to plastic and paper bags and say 'hello' to these fun and colorful mini-totes.

This baggie may be small but it's packed with smart features:

- Made with easy care wool-acrylic blend yarn
- Stretchable, super durable and strong to handle several ounces of produce
- Close by slipping the handle in the adjacent loop
- Stylish enough to be used in the mall, beach, park or on a date
- Size is approx. 8 inches wide and 7 inches long (excluding handle), when laid flat and empty

QUICK ECO-FACTS:

• One less grocery bag per person per year would reduce waste by 5 million lbs. and save $250,000 in disposal costs.

• When 1 ton of paper bags are not used, 3 cubic meters of landfill space are saved and 13 - 17 trees are spared.

So, go ahead. Shop smart and stay 'green'. Your fruits and veggies will sure be smiling too.

name: iSleeve for your iPhone or iPod Touch - Dark Cocoa
description:
Presenting the NEW iSleeves from UrArtist, cozies that make sense.

Protect your iPhone, iPod Touch or any phone or gadgets of similar dimensions, while toting it in style. 

Made of easy care acrylic yarn. It is durable yet has a soft feel to it. Just slip it on your little think tank. Then, get the 'wow' effect from your classmates and peers when it's time to pull it out. 

Machine washable, tumble dry low.

iSleeves are shipped the next day from order date (anywhere in the world), as each one is crocheted individually for you. The one in the photo is only a sample. 

Have a different size and color in mind? Custom made orders are available, just convo/ contact me with your preferred size and color.

NOTE: Actual color may slightly differ from due to different computer monitor settings.

***Get the matching sleeves for your macbooks or laptops from the 'Laptop Sleves' section in my shop.***

Thank you.

name: Laptop Sleeve for 13 inch APPLE MACBOOK
description:
Stand out from the crowd with this unique laptop sleeve. Protect your macbook or any 13 inch laptop with similar dimensions, while toting it in style. The cool colors are sure to splash you with added inspiration in school or at work.

Made of 100% 'So Soft Yarn' brand acrylic. Single crocheted with double yarn for durability and extra padding. It is durable yet has a soft feel to it. Just slip it on and put it in your bag. Then, get the 'wow' effect from your classmates and peers when it's time to pull it out.

Machine washable, tumble dry low.

Laptop sleeves are shipped 3 days from order date (anywhere in the world), as each one is crocheted individually for you. The one in the photo is only a sample.

Have a different size and color in mind? Custom made orders are available, just convo/ contact me with your preferred size and color.

NOTE: Actual color may slightly differ from due to different computer monitor settings.

Thank you.
